introduction.subtitleEn: "Amarathon" is a 12-hour online event initiated by the Amazon Web Services China User Group (CN-UG). The name "Amarathon" is derived from the combination of Amazon and Marathon, symbolizing the spirit of continuous sharing and exploration.
